definition: of the utmost importance/of highest priority
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: However, in HSR territory, the issue is even more important.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在高铁领域，这项事务更是重中之重。

sentences.english: The second, list "eat deeply two" as the most important.
sentences.chinese: 第二，把“吃透两头”列为重中之重。

sentences.english: Therefore, improving the pressure-blasting machine production can do is dressing industrial center.
sentences.chinese: 因此，提高制砂机的生产能办是选矿工业的重中之重。

sentences.english: Conflict-affected and fragile states are a special focus.
sentences.chinese: 受冲突影响的国家和脆弱国家是重中之重。

sentences.english: He saw cutting public spending as another priority.
sentences.chinese: 他将裁减公共开支看为另一项重中之重。

sentences.english: Teaching self-control has become a big focus for early childhood education.
sentences.chinese: 教授自我控制已经成为早期教育的重中之重。

sentences.english: As the ruling party, our party has always been the most important anti-corruption work.
sentences.chinese: 作为执政党，我们党反腐工作一直都是重中之重。

sentences.english: Make primary prevention a top priority.
sentences.chinese: 将一级预防作为重中之重。

sentences.english: The choice of local interlocutors would be key.
sentences.chinese: 这时，寻找当地对话者就成为了重中之重。

sentences.english: Resolving the problem of "agriculture, rurality and farmer" is one of the most important work to the Chinese Communist Party.
sentences.chinese: 解决好“三农”问题是全党工作的重中之重。

sentences.english: First and foremost, Lazio must tighten up their backline.
sentences.chinese: 重中之重，拉齐奥必须加固他们的防线。

sentences.english: And agricultural non-point source pollution is the top priority.
sentences.chinese: 而农业面源污染又是重中之重。

sentences.english: Pedestrian management has become a major issue.
sentences.chinese: 其中，行人交通管理成为重中之重。

sentences.english: It is all-in-all part of the process.
sentences.chinese: 这是整个过程的重中之重。

sentences.english: And more importantly, the government should increase people satisfaction through tangible achievements.
sentences.chinese: 人民满意度是政府形象塑造的重中之重。

sentences.english: The issues become board- and top-management critical.
sentences.chinese: 这些问题成为董事会和管理高层的重中之重。

definition: important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
to attach importance to sth/to value
it goes without saying/it is self-evident
top priority job/matter of vital importance
opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity
the road one must follow or take/the only way
pressing in on one's eyelashes (idiom); imminent
